Texts.Eng: Are gonna accomplish great things together!
But now Earth is gone, and so are the Peacekeepers. I may be the only Peacekeeper left, but I ain't gonna let that stop me!
I wanna rebuild the Peacekeepers! I wanna bust some crime rings! And I wanna look mighty slick doin' it all! Are you with me, partner?!
It was a nice goal, but it don't mean you ain't gonna have some folks wantin' to throw the first punch. That's where we came in.
Let me lay out the facts for yer. Sit tight, partner.
Out of the public eye, we'd keep Earth safe so that the Protectorate could safely promote their message of unity. It was a darn good time for us all.
The ^orange;Terrene Peacekeepers^white;, a quiet team of expert detectives an' bounty hunters who dismantled the organisations threatenin' peace on Earth.
The name's ^orange;Captain Noble^white;, an' I think you and I...
Well ain't this my lucky day. One of you managed to escape, huh? Looks like you can take care of yourself as well.
When the Terrene Protectorate formed, it aimed to unite the universe with diplomacy - hugs an' kisses an' all that.
You there! You're holdin' a Matter Manipulator, ain't yer?
